content.raw:
I think that would make sense. @shaunj could you try this? If this helps I'll change it in my code.

My take is that if this should work we have fixed one of two bugs. First being the column-name hierarchy second being the import thing.
My current take on why the imports make a difference is that, spinning_top works in one case and not in the other. Which would disable the feature in case of a "wrong" import. I haven't tested this theory yet but will do so in the next few hours and then update here.

Update: spinning_top works just fine both times
